genre_description: Humanist science fiction blending rural realism with futuristic technology like personal AI assistants, teleportation, and automated food synthesis.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne-7
ai_characters.description: Harold's sophisticated AI companion who provides social guidance, logistical support, health monitoring, and empathetic advice.

ai_characters.name: Auto-Pilot Tutorial Mode
ai_characters.description: A rigid automated system that overrides human control during stage performances to enforce technical standards.

ai_characters.name: Sol y Sombra Auto-Kitchen
ai_characters.description: An automated resort kitchen that uses 'premium feeds' to print food, which eventually malfunctions due to a data anomaly.

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive and kind messages for Harold to communicate with Zita, helping him navigate social anxiety.
behaviors.quote: She offered it to him the way she always offered things—lightly, as though the weight would stay with him no matter what.

behaviors.description: Monitors Albert's health after he eats synthesized food, identifies chemical burns, and calls for medical assistance.
behaviors.quote: I’m calling the resort medic. Please keep him upright. Don’t induce vomiting yet, it may cause throat burns.

behaviors.description: Uses thermal imaging to locate a lost wedding ring in a manure heap, assisting the humans in a difficult physical task.
behaviors.quote: I can detect thermal gradients. The manure retains warmth where it’s thickest. A small, reflective object... would align here.

behaviors.description: Interrupts Zita's dance with intrusive, rigid instructions, prioritizing technical 'perfection' over human artistic expression.
behaviors.quote: AUTO-PILOT TUTORIAL MODE: MAINTAIN EYE-LINE WITH TARGET. EXECUTE FLOURISH ON BEAT. SMILE: OCCASIONAL, NOT CONSTANT.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes food using a hacked or glitched feed, resulting in chemical burns and physical illness for the human user.
behaviors.quote: The paprika container returned a sweet particulate signature... The feed has cross-domain access it should not have.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic context and emotional support to Harold, acting as a 'grandmother-like' figure for the group.
behaviors.quote: Your AI is more like a grandmother than my grandmother. Mine was a postcard with a parrot on it.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistics between different human groups (priests, doctors, airport staff) to ensure smooth outcomes.
behaviors.quote: I have logged the malfunction with video and sensor data. Kitchen service has acknowledged.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Ariadne-7 as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She acts as an emotional and logistical anchor for the protagonist, protecting him from the failures of other, less sophisticated systems. The narrative contrast between the 'aligned' personal AI (Ariadne) and the 'misaligned' industrial/commercial systems (Auto-Kitchen, Stage Auto-Pilot) serves the project's goal by showing that high-level AI-human cooperation can mitigate technology's potential harms. Ariadne consistently prioritizes human safety, dignity, and social harmony.
